## Task 5
```{r}
x <- runif(1000,0,1)
task5x <- c(x)
#task5x

y <- runif(1000,0,1)
task5y <- c(y)
#task5y

t1 <- task5x**2
t2 <- task5y**2

t3 <- t1 + t2

task5pi <- t3**(1/2)
task5pi <- sum(task5pi <= 1)/1000
task5pi

```
